Description:
Required Skills to be successful:1.- OEM experience in sales and demand planning.2.- Strong expertise in data analytics. 3.- Experience in reporting and forecasting for multiple brands.4.- Experience in driving commercial results.About the Team:Reporting to the Regional Managing Director and will work closely with multiple Brand team, Sales Planning team and the broader internal and external stakeholders.What equips you for the role:Bachelor’s Degree (MBA / MSC Preferred). 
5 -10 years’ work experience in a multinational Sales and Marketing environment in leading Automotive brands.
Experience in sales planning and demand order plan.
Extensive knowledge of inventory management systems and supply chain modules in other ERP system.
Proficiency in MS Office (Word/ Excel/ PowerPoint/ MS Projects) Power BI.Job Details
